EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshops_Q216.Confirmation - San Antonio
EmailTemplate.subject: You're Confirmed
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/st-louis]]> Thank you for registering for the upcoming Cloud Native Workshop in San Antonio. See event details below:
Date: Tuesday, June 14, 2016 Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM Location: La Cantera, 16641 La Cantera Pkwy, San Antonio, TX 78256
{{my.Save the Date San Antonio}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/cloud-native-workshop/houston]]>.
